item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: App that asks 'why?' every time you unlock your phone (226 points | 127 comments)
2. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (253 points | 88 comments)
3. I Wrote "Janet for Mortals" (127 points | 18 comments)

6. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (96 points | 34 comments)
7. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (259 points | 40 comments)

9. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (339 points | 132 comments)

13. Git-crypt – transparent file encryption in Git (89 points | 31 comments)

21. We can mine asteroids for space food (149 points | 183 comments)
22. Mitigating WiFi deauth attacks with Ubiquiti Protected Management Frames (2022) (29 points | 8 comments)
23. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (86 points | 40 comments)
24. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (209 points | 126 comments)
25. I Stopped Using Kubernetes. Our DevOps Team Is Happier Than Ever (138 points | 112 comments)
26. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (58 points | 33 comments)
27. Remembering Cyberia, the first ever cyber cafe (120 points | 76 comments)
28. The impact of the cosmological constant on past and future star formation (18 points | 2 comments)
